pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, March 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Warsaw, Poland

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Three Crosses Square

Note for media:

  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Canadian ambassador to Ukraine, Larisa Galadza.

Closed to media

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Warsaw Chopin Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

National Capital Region, Canada

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Ottawa.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Closed to media
